body:
So just wondering how often do  mods read the ban appeals?
Just curious














(Submitted mine yesterday morning and haven't heard anything yet)
body_tagged:
So just wondering how often do  mods read the ban appeals?
Just curious














(Submitted mine yesterday morning and haven't heard anything yet)
title: Ban appeals

replies.body:
Take's up to 2 - 3 week's. If no - one has replied, then i would send the email again. 

kthxbai 

-Morgan Freeman
replies.body_tagged:
Take's up to 2 - 3 week's. If no - one has replied, then i would send the email again. 

kthxbai 

-Morgan Freeman

replies.body: Sr Mod's+ check the appeals. A lot of appeals come in and it doesn't take ten seconds to answer each one, which is why you get a long wait time. But anytime upto a week should be your wait time. Bottom line, be patient.
replies.body_tagged: Sr Mod's+ check the appeals. A lot of appeals come in and it doesn't take ten seconds to answer each one, which is why you get a long wait time. But anytime upto a week should be your wait time. Bottom line, be patient.

replies.body: Thanks Just wanted to know if they don't respond does it mean your banned forever
replies.body_tagged: Thanks Just wanted to know if they don't respond does it mean your banned forever

replies.body:
Don't worry my friend, you won't be banned forever, it take's up to 9 months, that isn't forever.

-kthxbai

Morgan Freeman
replies.body_tagged:
Don't worry my friend, you won't be banned forever, it take's up to 9 months, that isn't forever.

-kthxbai

Morgan Freeman

replies.body: No, they should always respond, even if it's denied. If no reply comes in after one week, resend it.
replies.body_tagged: No, they should always respond, even if it's denied. If no reply comes in after one week, resend it.

replies.body:

Why can only Sr. Staff deal with it?

replies.body:
Maybe because they are not considered responsible enough.
Though if they can ban they should also be able to unban, in my opinion.
replies.body_tagged:
Maybe because they are not considered responsible enough.
Though if they can ban they should also be able to unban, in my opinion.

replies.body:
I can understand why Jr.Mods not being able to but Moderators have already earnt that trust and full acceptance into the staff team.
With a little training, you can get the Mods to help out. This would take a load off the Sr. Staff team.

replies.body: No, if they're retarded enough to ban you falsely, they will not be able to unban you correctly.

Skype is your best bet. I got no response from emails, ever, and I sent like 5 emails.
